Text: why do we need 3 different mkv versions of this episode? the answer is we dont.. what we need is an avi.. any avi.. i dont care about the quality or size.. i just wanna be able to watch the bloody thing
hey, Xander_Dean_Macio - just download VLC media player, ok? It supports MKV, AVI, what-have-you. Simple solution.
I agree with Xander on this one. I dont want to have to download ANOTHER program for viewing. Does anyone know if there is something I can download on to WMP so it will play it?
http://www.cccp-project.net/ That will have all the codecs you'll ever need.
